question: Are you leaving for one of the following reasons?

options.label: Birth or Adoption of a Child
options.message: You can be covered up to 12 weeks by the Paid Family and Medical Leave Program.

options.label: Own Medical Condition
options.message: You can be covered up to 20 weeks by the Paid Family and Medical Leave Program.

options.label: Caring for a Loved One
options.message: You can be covered up to 20 weeks by the Paid Family and Medical Leave Program.

options.label: Active Duty
options.message: You can be covered up to 26 weeks by the Paid Family and Medical Leave Program.

options.label: Other
options.message: You may not be covered by the Paid Family and Medical Leave Program, for more information go here.
